Dear Cosmin,

 

Kindly find attached the document hand signed by the external lawyer.

 

Also attached, please find the following documents that are mentioned in the Dreft confirmation:

 

1.	Certificate from the commercial register for Lifond Investments Limited
2.	Certificate from the commercial register for Alackon Limited
3.	Additional tax certificate for Lifond
4.	Additional tax certificate for Alackon
5.	Additional memorandum Lifond
6.	Additional memorandum Alackon 
7.	Passport and ID card of the UBO Ala Antoniou 
8.	Additional tax certificate for Ala Antoniou 
9.	Passport and ID card of the Sole Director of TIBIEL Dimitar Ivanov
10.	Two signed versions of the company ownership structure
11.	Article of association
12.	Extract of the commercial register for TIBIEL EOOD
13.	Good standing certificate for TIBIEL EOOD
14.	Decision for the appointment of the Director 

 

If you need anything else, please let me know!

 

Best regards,

 

Nikolay

Dear Nikolay,

 

Please find attached the Address containing my comments.

 

I kindly ask you to send me the document for final review, after filling in the information as per my comments.

 

Also, please take note that in case the option is the address from an external source, TIBIEL is required to:

 

*	mention the documents based on which the shareholding structure, the beneficiaries and the way the verifications were carried out;
*	enclose the complete shareholder’s structure.

 

 

Kind regards,

Cosmin

Please find attached the latest pending topics which need to be addressed as soon as possible:

 

(i)               ANRE Reporting for November 2023 – additional information needed for correct reporting on the new ANRE reporting platform;

(ii)             UBO Data update for BCR – risk of blocking account;

(iv)            ANRE invoice for late payment of certain contributions and fees;

Thank you for your support and I am looking forward to your reply on the above.

 

Kind regards,
